item.title: IMPROVING USER EXPERIENCE AT HOLLAND'S REVENUE SERVICE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We're working towards making the user experience more effective for the substantial volume of users, both businesses and citizens electronically filing tax returns and accessing other electronic services.

item.title: GUIDING TRANSFORMATION AT BOL.COM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The tech stack is dominated by Java and Kotlin, and paramount importance is given to the web shop's resilience and responsiveness.

item.title: SUPPORTING ING IN UPGRADING BACK-END SERVICES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Within the Cash Excellence team, we are responsible for writing, maintaining and upgrading all the back-end webservice API's that ATM's around Europe use to perform limit checks, identity management, deposits, retracts, and cash orchestration. An additional focus of ours within ING is the "We Are Code" team that strives to create a fun and stimulating culture for all engineers, uplifting culture, sharing new practices and boosting morale.

item.title: STREAMLINING SAVINGS AND INVESTMENT DIVISIONS AT RABOBANK

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We are a full stack development team operating on a full Microsoft stack, with all new architectures opering in Microsft Azure, Entelect is also assisting with the implementation of a migration and cloud-hybrid strategy for several existing applications

item.title: REVAMPING THE MOON UNIT'S CREW MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We migrated their existing web portal to React with a Golang based back-end, and enhanced their Golang back-end to provide additional management functionality. We also engaged a team of mobile developers that built a native iOS and Android app

item.title: ORION HEALTH'S REVOLUTIONARY PATIENT MONITORING PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This included developing a NodeJS-based application to build a set of intermediary APIs that would be consumed by a 3rd party vendor building the mobile apps. The APIs were integrated into the Java based Smart Data Platform (SDP) using Keycloak for authentication.

item.title: CREATING AN ONLINE OCEAN FREIGHT SOLUTION FOR KOTAHI

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This includes the d evelopment of features on the coastal project, which is a platform to help manage container shipping around ports of New Zealand, as well as the redesign of the database to better identify container capacity across vessels and their voyages.

item.title: REWRITING CORETEX'S FLEET MANAGEMENT APPLICATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Data is presented on Google Maps, and can be used to help with routing, timing, driver-safety, coordination.

The rewrite includes:
- Introduction of a new React front-end
- Introduction of a restful API to serve the new front-end
- Integrating into existing WCF services hosting in a Service Fabric cluster
- Improving load times and responsiveness of the application

item.title: VISTA ENTERTAINMENT'S REVAMPED CENTRALISED USER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Vista is an Auckland-based company providing software products and services to the global cinema market.

CIM is a part of this initiative and involves creating an easy-to-use centralised user management and authentication system.

Currently products have discreet user maintenance stores of their own, which is often duplicated across locations. This project is a multi-tenant SaaS solution which is fully managed by Vista Services.

“Vista partnered with Entelect to fast-track the delivery of our next-generation cloud platform and we’ve been delighted with the results. The Entelect team’s technical prowess, process know-how and good old-fashioned experience all made for a successful delivery across teams and time zones. A+ skills, A+ service.”- Grant Smith, Chief Operating Officer at Vista

item.title: BUILDING GALLAGHER’S ANIMAL MANAGEMENT PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Gallagher IS a global leader in the innovation and marketing of animal management, security, fuel systems and contract manufacturing solutions.

Entelect created a native iOS application used to manage and monitor electric fences for animal management in farming.

The application ecosystem included a .Net Core Service layer hosted on Azure, a native Android application, a shared Kotlin library, hardware integration (Fence Energizer) and integration to a third-party tool (BlinkUp).

The user can manage and monitor their fence through the application. The project was run as an Agile project with developers working remotely.

“I would like to recommend Entelect as an outstanding software development partner. Entelect team demonstrated a great attitude and went above and beyond to deliver our projects on time. Their team is very professional and technically competent. I look forward to working with Entelect again in future.”- Rob Heebink, Research and Development Executive at Gallagher

item.title: IMPROVING CIB BANKING AT ABSA DIGITAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect is a technology partner of Absa in various departments throughout the bank. At Absa Digital, we are involved in improving the end-to-end deal process for CIB banking.

We work closely with a Salesforce team who are implementing the CRM requirements for the deals in this department.

We are also building a front-end to allow for quick and easy pricing of deals, provide an easy means to share prospective deals and simplify the approval process.

item.title: ABSA’S REVOLUTIONARY PAYMENTS SOLUTION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Debicheck solution ensures that all debit order collections are authenticated by the debtor on creation, amendment and cancellation. It also has a mobile offering for real-time debit order creation which enables Absa clients to create mandates on the go.

item.title:
ENHANCING ABSA’S CORPORATE
LOAN PRICING TOOLS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The Oberon project is a team engagement with the Absa CIB department to redevelop their corporate loan pricing tools throughout Africa from previously managed Barclay’s IP into a new central pricing engine within Absa’s domain.

The aim for the tool is to not only consolidate the different product houses across the bank into a single system but to allow for easier cross selling between these product houses in order to optimise sales and returns at a portfolio level.

item.title: STREAMLINING MANUAL CLINICAL PROCESSES AT AKESO

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
This platform would allow therapists to easily track treatment progress, view upcoming or previous events, and access notes or recordings of these events.

A custom-developed solution allowed Entelect and Akeso the opportunity to get user input from nurses, therapists, patients and other stakeholders during the design of the solution from the ground up.

item.title: REVAMPING ALLAN GRAY’S FIND AN INDEPENDENT FINANCIAL ADVISOR PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The new system allowed the user to provide basic information investment services required, preferred language and location. Based on this criteria, the FAIFA platform matched the user with advisors.

Following the engagement, the investor fills in a summary questionnaire on the advisor. Allan Gray aggregates this data, and reviews and manages the advisor profiles to ensure advisor profiles are updated.

item.title: SUPPORTING ALLAN GRAY’S CLIENT INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Invest+ is an internal system that manages client investments. The auto-release system manages the release and associated workflow of various institutional applications.

item.title: MODERNISING ALLAN GRAY DIGITAL CHANNELS FOR RETAIL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
- Supporting some of their existing software systems (namely Allan Gray Online (AGO) and the communication engine), as well as working on the new stack (for new AGO and mobile platform).
- Building new investor and advisor reporting applications.
- Building transactional applications and workflows to support digital authorisation, through processing and manual form pre-population and submission.
- Writing new applications for employee retirement scheme reporting and management.

item.title: AVIS FLEET SERVICES’ VEHICLE COMPARISON TOOL TRANSFORMATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
1. Enable salespeople to identify and present thorough vehicle options to customers through an interactive vehicle selection and comparison tool.

2. Provide procurement and analytics teams with easy access to detailed total cost of ownership (TCO), data for vehicles on offer, and comparative reflections against other selected options.

item.title: STREAMLINING ANGLO AMERICAN’S SPATIAL DATA THROUGH A CENTRALISED PORTAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Included functionality for SDP Core:
- Manual publish mode from authoring applications to support the data types as below
- Supporting metadata on publish and storage method
- Support for various coordinate systems based on data pilots
- Data storage method and standardisation by data type
- User search portal to query/return results of published/replicated data. Filter and sort options on search.

item.title: BUILDING AN APPLICATION TOOLKIT LIBRARY FOR ANGLO AMERICAN’S DATA ANALYTICS ENVIRONMENT

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Part of the project also includes creating and maintaining documentation for standards and guidelines across all data analytics projects. These span development standards, architectural patterns, best practices, CI/CD, technology and tools, security and infrastructure. This is followed by product analysis before all go-lives to establish whether the application conforms to defined standards, procedures and guidelines.

item.title: IMPLEMENTING A SAFETY LEADING INDICATORS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR ANGLO AMERICAN

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Based on trend analysis from past incidents, the platform will analyse, predict and inform Safety Managers about potential incidents that may occur somewhere on a given site – allowing the mine to take proactive measure to avoid that incident.

These incidents are predicted based on a number of leading indicators.

item.title:
GUIDING A DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION STRATEGY FOR
BARLOWORLD EQUIPMENT

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: As one of the first sets of transformational deliverables towards the realisation of the BWE IT and digital strategy, this project set the tone for overall realisation for the strategy.

item.title: IMPROVING TECHNICAL ASSESSMENTS FOR BARLOWORLD LOGISTICS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Barloworld Logistics identified the following key areas to focus the audit on:
- Overall architecture, and the use of message-oriented middleware
- Database design
- Infrastructure, configuration and maintenance
- BI analysis and reporting to assess maturity
- Development processes and practices, such as the packaging and deployment of applications and services
- Multi-tenancy implementation to cater for various customer requests
- System performance and health monitoring

item.title: INTRODUCING A TRACER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR BAYPORT

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Bayport also wanted an efficient process to appoint prospective external Tracers as independent contractors, and the ability for the appointed Tracer to select matters within its area of operation according to pre-determined business rules

Since the end of 2019, the proven efficiency of the system has resulted in Bayport now “selling” this system to other financial companies as a service.

item.title: BIDTRAVEL’S CUTTING-EDGE BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE IMPLEMENTATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The system has significantly increased data quality. This validation enforces rules on the field sizes to ensure data reaches the brands in a consistent format.

Errors are fed into a dashboard for the team to review. A Master Product dimension has been created across the different brands to allow for like-for-like reporting.

item.title: OVERHAULING CBI ELECTRICAL’S ONLINE SCHEMATICS PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Leveraging cutting edge browser and web technologies, Entelect developed an online, cloud-based design tool with drag-and-drop usability, inline configuration and real-time calculations and validation to guide the process. The tool also then allows the designer to save, version, and retrieve a bill of materials for their diagram using standard or customised parts that could be sourced from CBI-electric.

item.title: CELL C’S CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE TRANSFORMATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
We’ve been working in various agile squads complete with all the required skills in the digital transformation initiatives.

These squads have tackled upgrades or full rebuilds of solutions for online self-service, in-store sales support and Black, Cell C’s disruptive video-on-demand streaming platform.

item.title: REDESIGNING CORONATION’S INVESTMENT ADMINISTRATION AND CORRESPONDENCE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: An Entelect team developed and enhances the Coronation correspondence platform, a complex solution for managing regulations for the sending and tracking of statements, transfer documents, and other communications across a variety of product sets.

item.title: DB THERMAL’S MATERIAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The system requirements were to:
- Import and maintain material master lists and colli lists
- Provide users the means to easily view and process material through the various states – from raw materials, to machining or refining, to production
- View a summarised progress report on the project’s material requirements and utilisation
- Easily view the location and status of any quantity of material at any point on the workflow
- Track and audit all actions against materials throughout the process

Additionally, the material management system needed to support the varied workflows adopted by two of the other major operations underway within DB Thermal.

item.title: A FLEXIBLE AND DIGITAL SALES PLANNING SYSTEM FOR DE BEERS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The De Beers team wanted to move away from the constraints of their existing system. The primary objective of the project is to combine multiple existing systems (product availability forecasting, future intake forecasting, allocation optimisation, customer data management, and order management) into a single application.

The new system will also be able to manage multiple different supply contracts and their unique requirements, and their expanded product range and collections.

item.title: AUTOMATING THE AUDIT GRADUATE RECRUITMENT PROCESS AT DELOITTE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect was involved in providing the initial detailed specification for the project and thereafter engaged with us to develop and implement the specified solution. The Deloitte AGR solution will be to be used to manage, track and report the recruitment process of a graduate from the application step up to the time where a Training Contract is awarded, through the process until they are ultimately employed by Deloitte.

item.title: DELOITTE TRACKS MILLIONS OF DOLLARS IN IMPORT MOVEMENTS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The DESMAT system is customisable per sector and also tracks the import/export of alcohol and Coca-Cola Africa’s sugar tax compliance.

As a real-time regulatory and compliance process management tool, the application was required to have both intra- and inter- company functionalities that fulfil statutory requirements, payable and claimable statutory levies and taxes.

item.title: DELOITTE’S DYNAMIC SURVEY ENGINE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The data warehouse serves as a central consolidation point to leverage existing Deloitte data for use within the new solution.

The Entelect team provides the Deloitte Benchmarking project with a number of homegrown tools and bleeding-edge technologies, coupled with an agile approach to the software development lifecycle to achieve its goals.

item.title: DETNET DISRUPTS THE MINING INDUSTRY

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect discovered the solution to the challenges DetNet was facing by seamlessly combining user experience (UX) with software development using design thinking and agile methodologies.

item.title: DISCOVERY’S REVOLUTIONARY GROUP RISK PRICING ENGINE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The solution is used by multiple users throughout the risk and pricing process across multiple business units. This includes the risk and pricing, and franchise teams.

The solution is geared to generate actual quote packs and prepares them for installation in Discovery’s underlying policy management systems.

item.title: DISCOVERY HEALTH’S CUTTING-EDGE CLINICAL COMPLIANCE SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect is also involved in numerous projects across the department, including the clinical payment gateway system, and engagement and compensation solution, the first clinical compliance system in South Africa and a family member tool which analyses medical risks.

item.title: DISCOVERY HEALTH IMPLEMENTS ROBUST PLATFORM FOR HEALTH ID

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Doctors can use HealthID to check all the claims patients have submitted to their scheme for consultations with healthcare providers, as well as the results of any laboratory tests they have undergone that were processed through the scheme.

The Entelect team helped build out the HealthID web proof of concept into a fully featured production Angular app and supplied the back-end services for all integrations.

item.title: REVAMPING VITALITY’S ACTIVE REWARDS MALL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The mall provides a better user interface to easily find vouchers by category, Vitality partner or interactive banner. Members can then spend their reward points on vouchers from various rewards partners on the app.

item.title: DISCOVERY VITALITY’S INNOVATIVE REWARDS PROGRAMME

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The trusted partnership with Discovery Vitality is built on the high quality of our work and the consistent delivery of our teams.

The Vitality programme has over 1.9 million active users.

item.title: SUPPORTING DISCOVERY GROUP INFORMATION SERVICES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The team also manages key portals such as the Financial Advisor Zone, Virtual Assistant and Direct to Customer. In the Interactive Messaging space we are aiding Discovery with rewrites of legacy systems that handle bulk communications.

The mobile team is responsible for supporting the progression of the RSA Discovery member app on both the Android and iOS platforms. We also provide UX experience to GIS which aims to be a centre of excellence for UI and UX design thinking across Discovery.

item.title: EASYEQUITIES DISRUPTS THE FINANCIAL SERVICES INDUSTRY

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Purple Group is a proudly South African fintech company that aims to empower South Africans by offering a cost-effective, user-friendly and engaging investment and trading tool. The Entelect team worked closely with Purple to develop the EasyEquities platform.

Entelect developed a mobile-friendly platform that also enabled Purple’s clients to invest in securities. The platform is a solution designed to allow users to trade securities on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange and in US markets. This includes whole-share and Fractional Share Rights (FSRs).

Entelect’s flexible engagement models and cost-effective approach helped Purple to deliver on its mission, by providing dynamic implementation solutions to the EasyEquities platform.

The platform currently has 85 000 users.

“The engagement of the entire team in the delivery continues to impress me. Seeking first to understand the business case and then constructively provide solutions to meet and often exceed expectations.”- Paul Jansen van Vuuren, Chief Technology Officer at Purple Group

item.title: ENHANCING REAL ESTATE WITH EBAY
EUROPCAR’S ROBUST ONBOARDING PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The primary users of the platform are insurance call centre agents, Europcar call centre, customer care and branch users that confirms the requested reservations.

A key driver for the project is speed to market for new insurers and operational efficiency in the call centre by having teams service multiple insurers on a single system instead of having dedicated teams per system and insurer.

item.title: EUROPCAR CUSTOMER SELF-SERVICE INNOVATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: A key driver for improving the CX and UX is for Europcar to ‘own their own customers’. With a smooth and efficient direct and collection model, more customers will choose to book directly or simply go instore as ease of use is improved.

item.title: MODERNISED END-TO-END CLAIMS ADMINISTRATION AT FEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The requirements were to replace their legacy desktop-based application with a redesigned web-based platform to support their underwriting, registry, claims and pensions departments working from branches located in Johannesburg, Cape Town and Durban.

The platform utilises the latest Microsoft Azure technologies and is built for scale and flexibility as more companies move from the Compensation Fund over to FEM.

The Entelect team is involved end-to-end as the technology provider from analysis, UX, development, testing, support and infrastructure setup.

item.title: FLEETAFRICA’S END-TO-END RISK ENGINE AND QUOTING PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect worked closely with FleetAfrica's Risk & Pricing division to model the many financial risks, and then overhaul the quality of the fleet modelling.

Entelect provided FleetAfrica with an end-to-end, fleet quoting platform with real-time risk analysis and pricing. The team consolidated data from various sources to improve risk modelling and financial forecasting, to reduce quote turnaround times.

item.title: FNB SECURITIES TRANSFORMS ONLINE TRADING

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We provided 3 full-stack web developers to build both the front-end and the underlying back-end infrastructure. The project took approximately 10 months to deliver.

item.title: FNB ROLLS OUT DYNAMIC ROBO-ADVISOR PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The platform follows FNB’s advice philosophy when providing unit trust projections. Robo-advisors engage with customers on how it expects funds to perform and predict whether customers would reach their investment goals or not. Thereafter, the platform allows for client onboarding onto the unit trust platform.

item.title: FNB DISRUPTS TRADITIONAL BANKING SERVICES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This includes helping business banking clients start, run and grow their businesses. While nav» within FNB covers both retail and business segments, our team focuses on the business banking space.
It's like a financial GPS that

item.title: FNB BUSINESS BANKING’S DYNAMIC ON-BOARDING
GREENSTONE FINANCIAL SERVICES’ CALL CENTRE ADMINISTRATION SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The system allowed the smart CRM to connect to the PABX, and also pull up a call centre script for the agent to refer to throughout the call.

item.title: DESIGNING GREENSTONE FINANCIAL SERVICES’ UNDERWRITING QUESTIONNAIRE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The questionnaire engine also required a designer tool to allow administrators to configure the look, feel and sectioning of different questions, plus white-label the web platform for different re-insurers.

item.title: HOLLARD BRINGS THE OLDEST FORM OF INSURANCE INTO THE DIGITAL AGE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect managed to prototype a seamless digital system that will provide a centralised data repository and mode of communication in turn improving overall efficiency and reducing cost to company.

The entire process allowed Entelect to not only provide an effective solution, but to instil a clear UX direction which allowed us to make a big impact on the business in a short timeframe.

item.title: HOLLARD ENHANCES THEIR OVERALL DIGITAL PRESENCE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect provides a number full-service and full-stack software engineering teams to Hollard in South Africa, enabling them to build out strategic solutions at high speed.

The projects we’re running and/or supporting include online customer self-service, corporate web presence, mobile applications, converged APIs, broker quoting tools and digital marketing initiatives.

This included their funeral insurance and car insurance product quotations.

Entelect helped build the back-end for the Hollard mobile app, and redeveloped their client portal.

“I’ve had only good experiences working with Entelect. They are experts in their field, their technical abilities are first-class and you won’t go wrong working with them.”- Liesl Dembovsky, Digital Platform Manager at Hollard

item.title: HOLLARD MODERNISES COMMERCIAL QUOTING WITH AN INTUITIVE WEB APPLICATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The application handles complex integrations with the line-of-business system to provide the users with a real-time view of clients and quotes across all branches nationwide and ensures that the rating across branches is consistent.

item.title: THE DATA SCIENCE BEHIND DRIVER BEHAVIOUR

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: After the initial architecture analysis and designing, an Entelect team implemented a solution to replace their existing IoT Hub utilising a number of Microsoft Azure services.

Entelect also investigated their risk-score model, which provide a risk rating for each driver, where we proposed machine learning models that could be used in place of the current statistical model. This allowed the process to be automated.

Additionally, Entelect recommended changes to the types of data used for their First Notification of Loss model currently in use for accident prediction which led to the improvement of the model’s long-term performance.

item.title:
STREAMLINING CLIENT APPLICATIONS
FOR LIBERTY INSURANCE BROKERS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The solution is completely mobile, enabling the advisory in the field to produce life insurance quotes real-time on their laptops.

It also allows brokers to capture electronic proposals and kick off the policy initiation and underwriting processes automatically.

item.title: LIBERTY’S INNOVATIVE SELF-SERVICE INVESTMENT PORTAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The second component is the call centre dashboard for MyLiberty that allows agents to view user account status and log into MyLiberty on behalf of a client to assist with registration issues.

item.title: LIBERTY TRANSFORMS CLIENT ON-BOARDING PROCESSES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The system interfaces with new systems like the InTouch App and existing systems like BPO, helping to bridge the gaps faced by client’s in their journey with Liberty. These gaps range from improving the Underwriting process to simpler tasks of pre-populating digital/digitised application forms where possible.

Entelect also developed an admin portal, which enables the monitoring and analysis requests for data via consumers of the Client Connect Portal.

item.title: LIBERTY PROVIDES RICH PLATFORM FOR MICRO-INVESTING

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Stash also helps users save with its Sunny Money feature that checks the weather and stashes money safely away if it’s sunny.

Entelect supports the entire SDLC, including two native mobile apps, with a comprehensive full stack team. This includes new feature development, technical support as well as facilitating the Agile development process.

Stash currently has 32 000+ active investors with R23 million assets under management.

item.title: LIGHTSTONE PROPERTY’S LEADING VALUATION SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect was involved from the initial scoping and delivery scheduling, and moved into the management and final implementation of the project.

Our team worked closely with the Lightstone technical and business team, resulting in a successful project outcome by providing the client with the ability to easily scale and add new features into the platform.

item.title: LIFTING PROPERTY24’S REAL ESTATE PRESENCE IN RUSSIA

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
We were required to do an entire migration of the development and test hosting to the Domofond environment. Entelect also assisted with implementing a new listing capture feature, as well as a realtor recommendation.

We used a distributed team model while alongside Property24 and made use of a virtual office concept to ensure seamless collaboration. This allowed us to communicate regularly with Domofond, and held weekly meetings on priority and new features to be added.

item.title: TRANSFORMING CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE AT MASCOM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Design and user experience were key factors from the start of the project in order to ensure better user journeys. Some of the functionalities include purchasing of airtime, data bundles, fibre to the home, prepaid electricity, and payment towards DStv subscriptions.

Entelect is also currently building the front-end for MyZaka Mascom Money – a mobile money service that offers Mascom customers a convenient and secure way to send, receive, buy and pay using their mobile phones anywhere in Botswana.

The next phase is building the Mascom mobile app for both iOS and Android.

item.title: MODERNISING THE NO-FUNDS PLATFORM FOR MTN GROUP DIGITAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The No Funds platform goes beyond offering a static webpage, and MTN aims to use this project as a testing ground for innovative ways for interacting with subscribers, analysing usage to promote real data-driven decisions, and productising the platform across the various MTN operating countries.

The platform engineered by Entelect aims to provide an enhanced user experience, surfacing product information to customers, and funnel traffic to MTN’s suite of applications such as Ayoba, MusicTime, and MoMo, and third-party advertisers.

Additionally, the platform aims to reduce operating costs by intelligently optimising bandwidth for the site, and enabling AB split testing and dynamic content functionality.

item.title: SHOWCASING MICROSOFT TECHNOLOGIES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
TechEd Africa is the leading Microsoft technology event. Showcasing Microsoft's technologies over four days, it includes a range of industry leaders speaking on a wide range of topics.

To enable delegates to better manage their TechEd experience, Entelect was commissioned to build a range of web and Windows apps as well as the backend management system. The apps worked excellently and assisted the whole TechEd process.

item.title: ROBOTICS IN GENERAL SURGERY FOR MIMIC’S MSCORE PORTAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Those metrics and sessions are synchronised from the skills simulator devices to an Azure hosted MSSQL server. Every hour a caching job runs to aggregate and calculate all the current data synchronised into proficiencies, time spent on simulators, passes and fails.

The MScore user portal then displays the information in a graphical way to show the user their progress/proficiency in a curriculum/exercise and how that compares to the institution to which they belong. Institution administrators have access to see all the users of their institutes data for further evaluation.

item.title: MMI HOLDINGS’ DYNAMIC FINANCIAL WELLNESS MULTIPLY MONEY APP

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
This is quantified as the continuous process of planning and managing an individual’s money so that they can afford their expenses (and reach their goals over their lifetime). As such, Entelect software engineering experts supported the Multiply journey towards creating a digital platform and front-ends for both web and mobile channels that blend personal financial management with transactional and servicing capabilities.

The recently launched multi-channel solution is integrated to the Multiply rewards programme, and is easy to use and fun – guiding individuals on making better day-to-day decisions, and promoting spend-management.

item.title: REVAMPING THE MOMENTUM IT ENVIRONMENT AND MULTIPLY PORTAL

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
This involved taking ownership of the analysis and specification phase, project management, software and solution architecture, system development, deployment and post production support.

After successful deployment of the new Multiply system, customers now have access to a wide range of tools, assessments, advice and incentives for clients to adapt their behaviour to improve their overall wellbeing.

item.title: ENHANCED DIGITAL EXPERIENCES FOR MOMENTUM CLIENTS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
- Smart Underwriting
- Smart Exits
- Smart Retirement
- Smart Onboarding
- Multiply for Corporates

This includes upgrades to the technology tool chain and the introduction of modern software quality practices.

item.title: STANDARDISING A POINT-OF-SALE SYSTEM FOR NANDO’S

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect was approached by Nando’s to assist with a point-of-sale project.

The nature of the project was to produce a detailed list of needs in order to compare against various products and services to select and standardise on one point-of-sale system across all Nando’s stores.

We required input from all levels of the organisation and collation and discovery of current and future business drivers.

It involved cross-selling of business drivers within the organisation in order obtain mutual agreement on priorities and expectations of practical outcomes.

item.title: OLD MUTUAL LAUNCHES FRESH MOBILE EXPERIENCES ON THEIR 175th BIRTHDAY

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect teams were engaged end-to-end as the technology partner along this journey.

item.title: BUILDING A NEW WEB PLATFORM FOR THE OLD MUTUAL GROUP OF COMPANIES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
They wanted a way to keep the look and feel consistent while giving each country the freedom to build and update the content of each site.

To date, the web team has consistently built seven new public websites that easily displays information on our solutions and capabilities, with some of the websites delivered also having e-commerce services included.

item.title: DELIVERING THE SCIENCE OF GROWING INTO CUSTOMERS’ HANDS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Omnia agriculture division’s competitive edge lies in Nutriology – the science of growing. This is Omnia’s business philosophy and involves more than just selling fertilizer to farmers – it is about optimising yield and crop quality to maximise returns while reducing farming and environmental risk.

The Omnia mobile and web solutions provide internal agronomists and sales representatives with a consolidated view of Omnia Fertilizer’s recommendation and sales processes, equipping the team with efficient tools to handle administrative tasks and adding value to their clients’ businesses.

item.title: UNLOCKING POTENTIAL WITHIN SOUTH AFRICA’S RENEWABLE ENERGY MARKET

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: POWERX, a subsidiary of Clean Energy Africa, is the sole licensed entity in South Africa which is able to trade renewable energy between generators and consumers using the national grid. As the business scaled, POWERX required a bespoke management system to support its business of trading renewable electricity.

Effectively the solution enables and empowers the organisation to transition away from many manual and disparate process towards a centralised set of data and workflows which have allowed POWERX to scale.

item.title: RMB IDENTIFIES TRADING PATTERNS IN GLOBAL MARKETS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
This project focused specifically on identifying behavioural changes in trading patterns for various clients across multiple instruments and provide a means to measure and analyse these behavioural changes in a quantifiable manner.

This time series data science problem extracts the mean shift of trading volume and value from clients, showing the optimal number of break points of a client’s trading behaviour.

item.title: RMB CORPORATE BANKING’S TRAILBLAZING DATA WAREHOUSE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect supported their new client-driven analysis, assisting the finance department to do financial and client reporting, and upskilling the team on Power BI.

item.title: INTRODUCING AUTOMATED CLAIMS VALIDATION AS A SERVICE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The RASCL (RGA’s Automated System for Claims Leakage) system, is a data-driven rules engine that was designed to integrate into an insurer’s existing claims process flow, allowing for an evolving feedback mechanism.

Further building on the static rulesets that is offered, several machine learning validations have been built leveraging on the scale of RGA’s data.

RASCL also offers insurers and third-party administrators the functionality of capturing and viewing claims via a client portal.

item.title: REINSURANCE GROUP OF AMERICA’S E-UNDERWRITING TRANSFORMATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This solution supported dynamic surveying, instant and parameterised loading calculations, easy integratability and flexible deployment strategies.

item.title: EMPOWERING SOUTH AFRICAN TRANSFORMATION STRATEGIES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Sage BEE123 provides a holistic broad-based black economic empowerment (B-BBEE) management solution.

By building payroll integration connectors, creating the ability to dynamically complete scenario planning and ultimately automate score calculations, the Entelect delivery team continues to make it easier for the Sage BEE123 clients to adhere and surpass their B-BBEE programme goals.

We continue to work closely with the Sage BEE123 product owner as technical advisors, delivery and execution teams. Our work includes full-stack software development services, database optimisation and continued innovation – to ensure optimal performance, while always pushing the product forward.

item.title: SATRIX CHANGES UP THEIR DIGITAL PRESENCE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Satrix is an investment company that offers access to various markets via several different investment products to the public.

Entelect assisted with the implementation of systems and processes that would enhance their digital offering to attract new clients, and provide a more seamless service to existing clients.

Entelect assisted with the consolidation of Satrix data to help gain strategic insights for future growth.

Entelect assisted Satrix in developing a new modern website with a custom content management system to make it easier to provide potential investors with up-to-date information. The new website improved marketing of their existing and new product lines.

item.title: SILICA’S DYNAMIC UNIT TRUST MANAGEMENT IMPLEMENTATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Our technology partnership needed to deliver all web development requirements within Silica's large product architecture.

Software streams catered both for internal initiatives and for several Silica customers indirectly. Entelect teams flexed over this multi-year journey, and covered all technology disciplines including custom software, business analysis and data solutions.

item.title: SILICA’S REPLATFORMING FOR INVESTEC ASSET MANAGEMENT

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
These systems tended to lead to archaic practices and process for business, increasing inefficiencies and increased costs. Key deliverable was to create a simple, secure, efficient, modern service-based API to facilitate multi-party and multi-application integration to cater toward demand from clients and partners for direct integration which weren’t available in the legacy systems.

The system fosters a customisable, continuously evolving, online ‘financial eco-system’ with advisors, investors, and integrators. At the same time, it minimises costs, maximises efficiency and increase market competitiveness.

item.title: SMOLLAN AHEAD OF THE FMCG CURVE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Providing a mobile framework that would empower users with functionality that would accelerate traditional operational processes.

Entelect was chosen as the Smollan partner of choice due to our large-scale capacity, and our reputation as industry and technical leaders.

item.title: SPECTRAMED’S REVAMPED SALES MANAGEMENT PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect provided a dedicated team to architect and build a custom sales solution that provided ubiquitous access to sales, leads and customer information across web browsers and iPads.

The portal included full offline functionality, document management, signing and workflow tracking.

item.title: STANDARD BANK LOTTO REVAMP FOR WEB AND MOBILE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The team also helped build a solution for license disk renewal. This also included some of the back-end API integration and integration with 3rd party service providers.

While doing the mobile dev for license disk we worked in parallel to make the lotto games available on web for Standard Bank’s internet banking site. We followed an approach where we had to use a different tech stack than the main internet banking website so that we can futureproof the work to fit in with their future digital strategy.

Lotto for web is also in production with Lotto and Powerball, with Daily Lotto in its final testing.

item.title: REIMAGINING STANDARD BANK’S GROUP CONTROL PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect also developed a risk warehouse which acted as a central repository for control first and enrich and include a variety of risk data across the bank.

item.title: IMPROVING FOREX TRADING IN AFRICAN MARKETS WITH STANDARD BANK

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The aim was to create an accessible forex trading solution that focuses on time. Time being the main factor with most forex application out there as booking trades can be a cumbersome process at times. The aim wasn’t to imitate similar solutions that already exist but to find the gap within these solutions and focus on the missing piece. Therefore, we aimed to simplify the viewing process for currency pairs within the African region, and allow for setting currency pairs to a watch list and setting alerts for rates.

Standard Bank is the global leader in providing clients with accurate and reliable information with regards to the African financial markets.

item.title: IMPLEMENTING PLATFORM ORIENTED IT AT STANDARD BANK CORPORATE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect is currently involved in the following projects:
- Risk App Store: The platform, pipeline and architecture in its entirety
- Digital Credit Paper: An application that digitises the processes for approving and declining corporate loans
- Legal Agent: An application to automate and generate legal documents
- Market Risk Limits: An application to measure the market risk exposures and alert limit breaches regarding trades and investments
- Covenant Tracker: An application to track all covenants regarding loans and deals
- Credit Consideration Matrix: An application to set up regulated question answers for big customers that is used to measure its risk when approving or declining a loan
- Property Valuation: An application to capture and calculate large properties’ market value

item.title: AUTOMATING STANDARD BANK’S LEGAL DOCUMENT GENERATION

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Legal Agent’s primary purpose is to handle the automated generation of legal contracts. Above and beyond that the system allows credit, legal and client coordination staff to collaborate on a legal agreement to ensure that the customer’s needs are tailored for.

The system is moving to a phase where any department in the bank will be able to create and manage their own custom legal agreement templates used to generate their required legal agreements.

item.title: AHEAD OF THE PACK - STANDARD BANK DIGITAL CHANNELS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Entelect have further provided full-stack development services and technical leadership for the development of numerous digital banking products for Standard Bank which are unique in the South African market.

The teams and products where Entelect is partnered include internet banking, online share trading, and back-end transaction fulfilment functionality.

Entelect is involved in the Online Business Banking(OBB) functionality and Security for Standard Bank’s Internet banking offering. OBB is focusing on onboarding small and medium enterprise clients onto the OBB platform

Our security team is focused on applying modern security features and architecture to Standard Bank’s existing environment.

item.title: STELLENBOSCH UNIVERSITY REVAMPS THEIR ELECTRONIC BOOKING SYSTEM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The new electronic booking system is saving the business unit hundreds of hours in time, and many more in scheduling conflict resolution.

item.title: STELLENBOSCH UNIVERSITY STREAMLINES THEIR MEDICAL STUDENT PLACEMENT PROCESS

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences at Stellenbosch University partnered with Entelect to revamp their placement process for medical students.
The solution extends to full curriculum management to accurately track resource utilisation and enable cost recovery from state funding.

item.title: TELKOM DGL REVAMPS PRESENCE IN THE GAMING INDUSTRY

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Entelect provided the technical direction, architecture and development services which allowed DGL to build and launch the revamped digital gaming league platform which supports complex leagues, cups, ladders and tournaments for first and third party organisers.

item.title: USING IOT REMOTE MONITORING FOR FREIGHT TRACKING AND PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The Transnet Engineering OEM strategy includes offering electrical equipment and digital solutions bundled with the sale of a locomotive or wagon. One such digital solution is the Locomotive Condition Monitoring System (LCMS) which is an IoT communication or gateway device fitted on-board locomotives.

Entelect has partnered with Transnet Engineering to design and develop the powerful and robust IoT management portal on top of the Microsoft Azure IoT stack.

“We were pleasantly surprised with how much work was completed by Entelect in the short time period without compromising its quality. My guys have spoken highly of the Entelect development team – especially their willingness to adapt as they made sure everything was as we needed for optimum operational usage.”– Susan Mani, Principal Engineer at Transnet Engineering

item.title: UPGRADE AND MAINTENANCE OF AN ONLINE GEM AUCTION PLATFORM

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This included moving the platform to the Microsoft Azure cloud infrastructure, allowing for resources to be ramped up quickly during high-load auctions. Other functional enhancements have also been made to platform to ensure a robust and feature-rich auction platform is presented to Trans Atlantic Gem Sales’ client base.

item.title: PAYMENT SOLUTIONS FOR VODACOM FINANCIAL SERVICES

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
This will allow them to service merchants through both physical point of sale devices and ecommerce solutions. Our development and analyst teams are working across several agile delivery squads to design, build and implement brand new first-party mobile payments and wallet functionality across web and mobile channels for Vodacom's customer base.

The payment platform will provide merchants with many payment options such as card payments, EFT, QR code scanning and loyalty point. Other features are being developed to allow Vodacom to differentiate themselves, such as the Vodapay Digital Wallet and mobile payment app.

item.title: TRANSFORMING VODACOM’S PAYMENT GATEWAY

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Some of the major features we’ve built onto the platform include recurring payments, store card, consolidated storing of transaction from internal and external systems, and a reconciliation engine.

Current merchants that have integrated with the payment gateway include:
- All Events Africa
- Vodacom
- Airtime recharge and hardware purchases on MyVodacom App and Web
- Digital Lifestyle Services
- Vodacom World Bookings
- Prepaid electricity and water
- Netstar
- Toyota

item.title: CREATING SECURE FINANCIAL PLANNING SOLUTIONS FOR WA DAVIDSON

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
These services primarily focused on creating a self-managing web-based solution to cater for the following in a secure environment:
- Members
- Funds
- Employers
- Returns
- Claims
- Documents
- Reporting
